comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment > Ads showing up in newsfeed. Custom user rule added as per latest facebook.com github issue thread: (facebook.com,facebookcorewwi.onion#%#!function(){ var b=0,d=[];new MutationObserver(function(){document.querySelectorAll("div[data-pagelet^=\"FeedUnit\"]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"feed\"] > div:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"feed\"] > span:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div > div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div span > h3 ~ div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div h3~ div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"])").forEach(function(e){Object.keys(e).forEach(function(a){if(a.includes("__reactEvents")||a.includes("__reactProps")){a=e[a];try{if(a.children?.props?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")||a.children?.props?.children?.props?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")||a.children?.props?.children?.props?.feedEdge?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")){b++,e.style="display: none !important;";var f=e.querySelector("a[href][aria-label]:not([aria-hidden])");f&&(d.push(["Ad blocked based on property ["+b+"] -> "+f.ariaLabel]),console.table(d))}}catch(a){}}})})}).observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0})}();) > > but ads still persist after a couple of page refreshes. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jbrpmva.png)

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/132777#issuecomment-1289826136
>Ads showing up in newsfeed. Custom user rule added as per latest facebook.com github issue thread: [...]

Please remove old rule and add this one:
```adblock
facebook.com,facebookcorewwi.onion#%#!function(){ var b=0,d=[];new MutationObserver(function(){document.querySelectorAll("div[data-pagelet^=\"FeedUnit\"]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"feed\"] > div:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"feed\"] > span:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div > div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div span > h3 ~ div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div h3~ div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div h3 ~ div > div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"])").forEach(function(e){Object.keys(e).forEach(function(a){if(a.includes("__reactEvents")||a.includes("__reactProps")){a=e[a];try{if(a.children?.props?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")||a.children?.props?.children?.props?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")||a.children?.props?.children?.props?.feedEdge?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")){b++,e.style="display: none !important;";var f=e.querySelector("a[href][aria-label]:not([aria-hidden])");f&&(d.push(["Ad blocked based on property ["+b+"] -> "+f.ariaLabel]),console.table(d))}}catch(a){}}})})}).observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0})}();
```

issue.title: twitter.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://twitter.com/i/flow/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fi%2Fflow%2Flogin) ### Comment > Any time I open the menu to add a GIF to a tweet or whenever I need to log in I can't do it with adguard enabled. The menu comes up and them instantly blips away into the void of nothing ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/JBhx1BL.jpg)
Screenshot 2 [Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/JBhx1BL.jpg)
